casebody.data:
Gregory CRESCENZO, Administrator of the Estate of Jeffrey Crescenzo, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
MARGATE CITY BEACH PATROL, a Public Entity, and City of Margate, a Public Entity, Defendants-Petitioners. C-778 September Term 2017
080652 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 4, 2018

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION.

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001741-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
